page.title: 03A SCHOOL DAY
page.content:
I GET UP EARLY IN THE MORNING, WASH AND DRESS. FOR MY BREAKFAST I HAVE CEREAL, TEA AND TOAST. I HAVE TO EAT QUICKLY BECAUSE I HAVE TO CATCH THE 8.55 BUS TO SCHOOL.
WE HAVE A MILK BREAK AT 11 O'CLOCK AND OUR LUNCH BREAK AT 12.30. THERE ARE NO SCHOOL DINNERS SO WE BRING SANDWICHES FOR OUR LUNCH. WE GET OUT OF SCHOOL AT 3 O'CLOCK, AND MY MOTHER COLLECTS ME IN THE CAR.
WHEN I GET HOME I GET MY DINNER OF POTATOES, MEAT AND VEGETABLES. THEN I DO MY HOMEWORK AND PLAY OUTSIDE IF IT IS A GOOD DAY. IF IT IS WET I WATCH TELEVISION OR PLAY WITH MY TOYS.
AFTER TEA ALL THE FAMILY WATCH TELEVISION. I GO TO BED AT 9.30 SINCE I HAVE TO GO TO SCHOOL THE NEXT DAY.
